content:
ServiceDocumentFormatter Class

Definition

An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, such as AtomPub10ServiceDocumentFormatter.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("System.ServiceModel.Web, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract]
public abstract class ServiceDocumentFormatter
Inheritance
System.Object
ServiceDocumentFormatter

Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
